src:
Osvoji karte za meč Crvena zvezda – Totenhem!
Zaprati MOZZART bet Instagram stranicu…

01 Nov 2019

Osvoji karte za meč Crvena zvezda – Totenhem! Zaprati Mozzart Bet Instagram stranicu, lajkuj OVAJ post i do subote 2. novembra do 16.00 u komentaru prognoziraj koliki će biti TAČAN REZULTAT I UKUPAN BROJ KORNERA na meču između Proletera i Crvene zvezde
Mozzart pruža priliku za troje najbržih učesnika aktivacije koji pogode rezultat meča i broj kornera da osvoje po dve karte za utakmicu četvrtog kola Lige šampiona između Zvezde i Totenhema
PRAVILA:
1. U komentaru pored tipovanja OBAVEZNO upiši TAČAN username sa svog Mozzart Bet naloga, u suprotnom takav komentar neće biti važeći i uziman u izbor.2. U izbor ulaze samo autori komentara koji su PUNOLETNI.3. U izbor ulaze samo autori komentara koji su ZAPRATILI Instagram nalog Mozzart Bet4. Moguće je samo JEDNOM tipovati sa jednim Mozzart Bet korisničkim imenom.5. U izbor ne ulaze autori komentara koji su VIŠE puta poslati od strane jednog Instagram naloga.6. U izbor ulaze samo oni autori komentara koji imaju autentične Instagram naloge sa imenom i prezimenom koje se poklapa sa Mozzart Bet nalogom7. U izbor ulaze komentari poslati do subote 2. novembra do 16.008. U ponedeljak ćemo obavestiti autore komentara tri najbrža tipovanja.9. U obzir se uzimaju podaci sa zvaničnog sajta Superlige Srbije.
text:
Win tickets for the match Red Star - Tottenham!
Close the MOZZART bet Instagram page…

01 Nov 2019

Win tickets for the match Red Star - Tottenham! Bookmark Mozzart Bet's Instagram page, Like THIS Post and predict by Saturday 2nd November at 4:00 pm what the EXACT RESULT and TOTAL CORNERS will be in the match between Proleter and Red Star
Mozzart provides an opportunity for the three fastest activators to hit the score and the number of corners to win two tickets each for the fourth round of the Champions League game between Zvezda and Tottenham
RULES:
1. In the comment, besides typing, be sure to enter the correct username from your Mozzart Bet account, otherwise such comment will not be valid and will be selected.2. Only adult authors are eligible for selection.3. Only the authors of the comments who have CLOSED the Instagram account of Mozzart Bet4 are eligible. It is only possible to type ONE with one Mozzart Bet username.5. Selection does not include comment authors who have been repeatedly sent by one Instagram account.6. Only those comment authors who have authentic Instagram accounts with the first and last name that match the Mozzart Bet account are eligible7. Comments are submitted by Saturday 2 November until 16.008. On Monday, we will notify the authors of the three fastest typing comments.9. Data from the official site of the Serbian Superliga are taken into account.
